summary: This mod adds a follower inside the Old Hroldan Inn, based on the face preset of Tifa Lockhart (Final Fantasy VII) created and shared by Brandon3903 on Nexus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71260/?
descriptionHtml:
Please read at least the [color=#ffff00]GENERAL INFORMATION[/color] and the [color=#ffff00]TROUBLESHOOTING[/color] before posting about an issue or CTD. I won't reply to "It won't work" comments without giving further information.

[color=#ffff00]GENERAL INFORMATION: [/color]

This mod adds a follower inside the Old Hroldan Inn, based on the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71260/?]face preset of Tifa Lockhart[/url] (Final Fantasy VII) created and shared by Brandon3903 here on Nexus. 

If you think this mod won't suit your game, please ignore it. 

Tifa is flagged as essential, marriable and will level with you up to level 100. Is compatible with every Follower Manager.

[b][color=#ff0000]USE ONLY ONE VERSION:[/color][/b]

[u] TIFA MAIN VERSION

[/u]She uses custom clothes and fights only with her fists on combat, so without any adjustments (using an edit tool to change her settings on the plugin or a follower manager), she won't use any weapon by default.

[color=#ff0000]OR[/color]

[u] TIFA ALTERNATE VERSION [/u]

She uses vanilla equipment and weapons, her combat style settings are destruction magic (ice/lightning) and one-handed sword, but she'll also use bows and other melee weapons;

VIDEOS:

Thanks to Boxofbeer for a review (version 1.0):

[youtube]7PJ34_qa-cE[/youtube]

[color=#ffff00]COMPATIBILITY AND REQUIREMENTS: [/color]

Should be full compatible with any mod around, if you find any incompatibility please report it on the comments or via PM. Doesn't require any other mod to work.

[color=#ffff00]INSTALL/UNINSTALL:[/color]

-Use NMM/MO for easy install/uninstall; manual installation recommended for experienced users only.  

[color=#ffff00]RECOMMENDATIONS:[/color]

- please use a follower manager; I use Amazing Follower Tweaks but any other should work as well;
- don't use more than 2 followers at once when exploring a dungeon, things can be crowded easily;
- changing her outfit can lead to weird results since she use her own custom body/textures, specially if you use other body than 7B/UNP/Vanilla;
- Consider using Follower Commentary Overhaul for immersive Follower commentaries and actions;

[color=#ffff00]TROUBLESHOOTING & QUESTIONS:[/color]

Problem: She won't follow me.
Answer: install a follower manager; if you don't have it, probably you already have one follower with you (remember that the game limits the number of regular followers). 

Problem: I've installed the mod but can't find her. 
Answer: don't forget to activate the plugin TifaLockhartFollower.esp in tour Skyrim Launcher - Data Files or with your Mod Manager. 

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS: [/color]

I can't thank enough to them, without their permissions, resources, information, support and work I simply could't do anything. Kudos to all of them. 
- Base Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP body[/url] by Dimon99 
- Face and Body Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy. 
- Eyes: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam. 
- Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies Stealthic Khaos and Shocky.  
- Brows: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url] by JimtownIrish.  
- Top (Outfit):[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53864/?] Sexy Vests (T)BBP - CBBE-UNP(B)-DG-7B-CHSBHC[/url] by Xauss 
- Skirt (Outfit): [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13363/?]Mini Sage Outfit for UNP[/url] by Tsuke76 
- Boots: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611/?]Gim Boots[/url] by Gimora

Also thanks to: 
Brandon3903 for creating the Face model, for the support, testing and help; [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7049561/? ]if you like Tifa leave a kudos for him[/url].
tktk1 for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team 
Mikanoshi for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13529/?]SMCO[/url] natilde for her [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25673/?]Standalone Follower tutorial[/url] 
DARKF0X127 for [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ihuedsk7QNc]AI Package tutorials[/url] 
Bethesda for the Creation Kit, Oblivion and Skyrim Games; 
Nifskope, 3DSMax, Paint.NET teams.

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/jrlcosta/myworkshopfiles/?appid=72850]My STEAM Workshop[/url]
author: Brandon3903 and JRCosta
